dict.acceptation: 破裂，打开；（使…）开裂；说（笑话）；开瓶；
断裂，折断；碎裂声，爆裂声；镜子破裂了；失去控制，衰退；
裂缝；试图；缝隙；（可听到响声的）重击；
训练有素的；技艺高超的；优秀的；一流的；

sent.orig: The drug is variously known as crack or freebase.
sent.trans: 这种毒品的叫法五花八门，有人称为crack，也有人叫它freebase。

sent.orig: The crack occurred in silica brick generally includes surface crack and layer crack.
sent.trans: 硅砖中裂纹包括表面裂纹和层裂。

sent.orig: Generally speaking, wall crack includes crack with force and crack without force.
sent.trans: 从大的方面说墙体裂缝分为受力裂缝与非受力裂缝。

sent.orig: The crack in the coal seam is divided into two kinds: endogenic crack and exogenous crack.
sent.trans: 煤层中的裂隙分两种，即外生裂隙和内生裂隙。

sent.orig: Price reform will be the hardest nut to crack, but we have to crack it.
sent.trans: 物价改革是个很大的难关，但这个关非过不可。
